member.name: T:SharpKit.Html.Extensions
member.summary: Provides Linq-like extensions for HtmlElement without requiring Clr mode This library requires a script include SharpKit.Html.Linq.js

member.name: M:SharpKit.Html.Extensions.Descendents(SharpKit.Html.HtmlElement)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the descendant elements for this element

member.name: M:SharpKit.Html.Extensions.Children(SharpKit.Html.HtmlElement)
member.summary: Returns a collection of the child elements for this element
